desc: And Also is a brand for happy and experimental fashion accessories like designer body belts, 24 Karat gold plated jewellery and stationery.We maintain superior quality checks and aim to make the clients comfortable with, and excited about their purchase.

layout.text: Fresh, Fun & Fabulous Gold Plated Goodness! This colourful, head turning fashion jewellery collection is dipped in fun with gold plated earrings, chokers, bracelets and more!
